successes.title: Incursion
successes.description: Play the diabolical Axis or the stalwart Allies in the 2nd edition of this critically acclaimed board game. Welcome to the Grindhouse.

Pledges.description: Ala Carte- For 1st edition owners that wish to pick and choose which components of their game to upgrade. Choose any add-ons in any quantity. If the total amount of your pledge is $60 or more, you get the (Gretel icon) stretch goals.

Brick and Mortar- Pledge if you are a retail storefront or non-discounting online retailer and wish to be on our distribution list, post-campaign. Being on this list will gain you limited access to Kickstarter Exclusive items (though not freebies). This game will likely not ship through a distributor in North America.

Wallflower- 30x42 art print of the "This is Gotterdammerung", Incursion movie poster rolled into a tube and delivered to your door. Suitable for framing. No add-ons at this pledge level, please. Ships separate from game.
SNAFU-  includes SNAFU, Exclusive Gretel figure (plastic), and applicable freebies/upgrades, shipped to your door in the USA.
Plastichead- just like Metalhead but Exclusive figures are in Plastic instead of metal

Metalhead- Exclusive Gretel in metal and Exclusive Figure Pack #1 in metal, New Incursion and SNAFU rules pamphlets, SNAFU Counters, SNAFU double-board poster, Model card deck for Incursion and SNAFU (including unlocked character cards for plastic figure freebies) plus any applicable unlocked freebies delivered to your door in the USA.
Grinder- includes Incursion, Exclusive Gretel figure (plastic), and applicable freebies/upgrades, shipped to your door in the USA.
Double Feature- includes Incursion, SNAFU, Exclusive Gretel figure (plastic), and applicable freebies/upgrades, shipped to your door in the USA.

Buckets of Blood- Starts with Double Feature and includes one of every single starting add-on (except 30x42 Art Print Poster) plus every non-metal upgrade, freebie, and one of every add-on that gets unlocked throughout the campaign (plastic versions of figures, only) shipped free anywhere in the world. This is all-in. Welcome to the Grindhouse.
